00152 /*
00153      Just a few comments.
00154      1)  The single_na30 testcase has the new Allele Peaks functionality invoked and has as inputs the appropriatly updated snp-reference file.
00155          It uses as input a CN reference that was generated using the na30 annotations file. The testcase itself runs on the na30.1
00156          annotations file.  This tests the CN flag functionality. At present the snp-reference file does not have a section that forces
00157          the use of the new LOH algorithm.
00158      2)  The single_newLOH testcase tests the new LOH algorithms. The snp-reference does have a section for the new AP algorithm.  No specific
00159          testing of CN flags was attempted for this testcase.
00160      3)  The single testcase is the original testcase using the na28 annotations file.  It has input of an updated AP section since the
00161          AP algorithm does not have a fall back to the old style if the appropriate section does not exist in the snp-reference.  The
00162          idea is to keep this testcase around to validate backwards compatibility.
00163      4)  The batch testcase creates and uses CN/SNP reference files.  It uses na28.  Keep it around to validate backwards compatibility.
00164          The idea being that the changes to the CN flags functionality to accomodate different annotation files in the create/use
00165          portions should not mess up the situation where the annotations files are the same for the two operations. I did have to
00166          update some of the golden cychp files, since the original algorithm wrote values for all ProbeSets in the Probeset section
00167          even those with processFlag=0.  This was not a problem in the original code since these were completely filtered out befor
00168          any analysis began.
00169      5)  The batch_newLOH testcase tests the create/use functionality when the new LOH algorithm is invoked.  Tests that the snp-reference
00170          file that is created gets all the new LOH information needed.
00171 */
00172 
00173 void run()
00174 {
00175 
00176         single_na30();
00177         batch_newLOH();
00178 #if( defined(_WIN64))
00179         CytoScanBatch();
00180         CytoScanUse();
00181         CytoScanCreate();
00182 #endif
00183 
00184 
00185 
00186 #if ( (!defined(__MACH__)) && (defined(__LP64__)) )
00187         CytoScanBatch();
00188         CytoScanUse();
00189         CytoScanCreate();
00190         twoSevenMCreate();
00191         twoSevenCancerNA31();
00192         twoSevenCancer();
00193         batch_snp6_dual();
00194         batch_snp6();
00195         batch_snp6_dual_noAdapter();
00196         batch_snp6_noAdapter();
00197 #endif
00198         single_newLOH();
00199         batch();
00200         single();
00201 
00202 #if ( (!defined(_WIN32)) || (defined(_WIN64)))
00203         CytoScanBadAnno();
00204 #else
00205         Verbose::out(1,"APT-994: test-regression-copynumber-cyto: CytoScanBadAnno commented out for Windows 32 bit");
00206 #endif
00207             
00208 }
00209       // This test is identical to the batch testcase except for the input snp reference file. The new snp reference has sections which cause the
00210       // invocation of new loh algorithms. In the creation step, no differences should be found between the CN reference file generated in
00211       // the batch ran and the present test case. Thus in the comparison below the CN reference file's generated in batch and batch_newLOH are
00212       // compared to the same gold CN reference file. The snp reference will be different in this run than in the original batch run. So the
00213       // the batch and batch_newLOH have separate gold snp reference files.
00214       // In the use step for the new_LOH run, since the loh algorithm has different inputs (from the new snp-reference file), the cychp files
00215       // generated in batch and batch_newLOH will be different. Thus batch and batch_newLOH have separate gold cychp files to compare to
00216       // during the use portion of their runs.
00217 
00218 
00219 void batch_newLOH()
00220 {
00221       Verbose::out(1, "Working on batch_newLOH part 1.");
00222       std::string outdir = Fs::join(m_testDir, "batch_newLOH");
00223       Fs::rmdirPath(outdir, false);
00224       Fs::mkdir(outdir, false);
00225       vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00226       string command1 = "./apt-copynumber-cyto \
00227                     -v 3 --cyto2 true \
00228                     --force true \
00229                     --check-input-files true \
00230                     --text-output true \
00231                     --cnchp-output false \
00232                     --cychp-output true \
00233                     --set-analysis-name ca \
00234                     --meta-data-info wittgenstein=bushido \
00235                     --meta-data-info batchMode=Creation \
00236                     --reference-output " + m_testDir + "/batch_newLOH/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.REF_MODEL \
00237                     --snp-reference-input-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.na28.batch_newLOH.snpref.a5 \
00238                     --snp-reference-output-file " + m_testDir + "/batch_newLOH/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.snpref.a5 \
00239                     --cdf-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.CDF \
00240                     --chrX-probes ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.chrXprobes \
00241                     --chrY-probes ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.chrYprobes \
00242                     --annotation-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.na28.annot.db \
00243                     --probe-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.probe_tab \
00244                     --snp-qc-snp-list ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.snplist.txt \
00245                     --gender-override-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/HapMap-LOHReference-Full-Genders.txt \
00246                     --genotype-call-override-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/HapMapCalls_LOHReferenceSet-FullArray.txt \
00247                     --cel-files ../../../regression-data/data/cel/Cytogenetics_Array/CELFileList_5F5M.txt \
00248                     --out-dir " + m_testDir + "/batch_newLOH \
00249                     --male-gender-ratio-cutoff=1.3 \
00250                     --female-gender-ratio-cutoff=1.0 \
00251                     --xx-cutoff=0.8 \
00252                     --xx-cutoff-high=1.07 \
00253                     --y-cutoff=0.65 \
00254                     --keep-intermediate-data false \
00255                     --analysis log2-ratio-cyto2.gc-correction=true.median-autosome-median-normalization=true.median-smooth-marker-count=5.trim-high=2.0.trim-low=-2.5 \
00256                     --analysis kernel-smooth.sigma_span=50 \
00257                     --analysis cn-cyto2.diagonal-weight=0.995.mapd-weight=0.22.min-segment-size=5.hmm-confidence-weight=0.6 \
00258                     --analysis cn-cyto2-gender.cutoff=0.5 \
00259                     --analysis cn-segment \
00260                     --analysis loh-cyto2.lohCNSegSeparation=1000000.minInformation=100.lambdaCritical=8.0 \
00261                     --analysis mosaicism.marker-bandwidth=6000.confidence-window=251 \
00262                     --analysis allele-peaks.step=100.window=250.point-count=128.bandwidth=0.45.cutoff=0.05 \
00263                     --local-gc-background-correction-reference-method pdnn-reference-method \
00264                     --wave-correction-reference-method wave-correction-reference-method.trim=2.0.percentile=0.75.demean=false \
00265                     --local-gc-background-intensity-adjustment-method pdnn-intensity-adjustment-method.predicted-intensity-bin-count=20.gc-bin-count=20.residual-trim=2.0 \
00266                     --image-correction-intensity-adjustment-method high-pass-filter-intensity-adjustment-method.data-block-rows=320.data-block-cols=2015.mini-block-rows=8.mini-block-cols=8.global-smooth-weight=256.local-smooth-weight=64.converged=0.0001 \
00267                     --wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method.bandwidth=101.bin-count=25.wave-count=3 \
00268             ";
00269 
00270         std::set<std::string> setLocalIgnore;
00271         std::string strFileName1 = "../../../regression-data/data/copynumber/copynumber-cyto/batch_newLOH/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.snpref.a5";
00272         std::string strFileName2 = m_testDir + "/batch_newLOH/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.snpref.a5";
00273 
00274         // See comments at the beginning of this testcase as to why we compare against the gold batch CN reference file. (And why there is no
00275         // separate gold batch_newLOH CN reference file.)
00276 
00277 
00278         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "SNPReference", "EMSNParameters", setLocalIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
00279         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "SNPReference", "EMSNArray", setLocalIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
00280         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "SNPReference", "SNPReference", setLocalIgnore, 0.0003, 1.0));
00281 
00282         strFileName1 = "../../../regression-data/data/copynumber/copynumber-cyto/batch/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.REF_MODEL";
00283         strFileName2 = m_testDir + "/batch_newLOH/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.REF_MODEL";
00284 
00285         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "Cyto2", "AntigenomicProbes", setLocalIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
00286         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "Cyto2", "MedianSignals", setLocalIgnore, 0.5, 0.999999));
00287         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "Cyto2", "ProbeEffects", setLocalIgnore, 0.0001, 0.999999));
00288         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "Cyto2", "SNPPosteriors", setLocalIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
00289         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "Cyto2", "SketchCN", setLocalIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
00290         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "Cyto2", "SketchSNP", setLocalIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
00291         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "Cyto2", "WaveCorrection", setLocalIgnore, 0.0001, 0.99999));
00292 
00293 
00294 
00295         RegressionTest test("batch_newLOH part 1", command1.c_str(), checks);
00296         test.setSuite(*this,  outdir, outdir + "/apt-copynumber-cyto.log", outdir + "/valgrind.log");
00297 
00298         bool bPassed = test.pass();
00299         if(!bPassed) {
00300             Verbose::out(1, "Error in: batch_newLOH part1. " + test.getErrorMsg());
00301         }
00302         else
00303         {
00304             Verbose::out(1, "Passed: batch_newLOH part1. " + test.getErrorMsg());    
00305         }
00306         {
00307             m_numPassed += test.getNumPassed();
00308             m_numFailed += test.getNumFailed();
00309         }
00310 
00311         if (bPassed)
00312         {
00313             Verbose::out(1, "Working on batch_newLOH part 2."); 
00314             string outdir = Fs::join(m_testDir , "batch_newLOH");
00315 
00316             std::string  goldDirectory="../../../regression-data/data/copynumber/copynumber-cyto/batch_newLOH";
00317             std::string  newDirectory= Fs::join(m_testDir, "batch_newLOH");
00318             string infix = "ca";
00319 
00320             std::map<std::string, float> mapEpsilon;
00321 
00322             std::set<std::string> setSetIgnore;
00323 
00324 
00325 #ifndef __LP64__
00326             {
00327                 std::string ignoreString = "Segments.Mosaicism";
00328                 setSetIgnore.insert(ignoreString);
00329                 std::string ignoreString2 = "ProbeSets.AllelePeaks";
00330                 setSetIgnore.insert(ignoreString2);
00331             }
00332 #endif
00333 #ifdef __APPLE__
00334             {
00335                 std::string ignoreString = "Segments.Mosaicism";
00336                 setSetIgnore.insert(ignoreString);
00337                 std::string ignoreString2 = "Chromosomes.Summary";
00338                 setSetIgnore.insert(ignoreString2);
00339                 std::string ignoreString3 = "ProbeSets.AllelePeaks";
00340                 setSetIgnore.insert(ignoreString3);
00341             }
00342 #endif
00343 
00344 
00345             vector<RegressionCheck *> checks2;
00346             checks2.push_back(new CychpCheck(
00347                                                 m_vCytogenetics_Array_SixFiles,
00348                                                 goldDirectory,
00349                                                 newDirectory,
00350                                                 infix,
00351                                                 setIgnore,
00352                                                 setSetIgnore,
00353                                                 mapEpsilon,
00354                                                 0.0001,
00355                                                 0.9999989,
00356                                                 false));
00357 
00358 
00359 
00360             string command2 = "./apt-copynumber-cyto \
00361                         -v 3 --cyto2 true \
00362                         --force true \
00363                         --text-output true \
00364                         --cnchp-output false \
00365                         --cychp-output true \
00366                         --set-analysis-name ca \
00367                         --meta-data-info wittgenstein=bushido \
00368                         --meta-data-info batchMode=Use \
00369                         --reference-input " + m_testDir + "/batch_newLOH/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.REF_MODEL \
00370                         --snp-reference-input-file " + m_testDir + "/batch_newLOH/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.snpref.a5 \
00371                         --cdf-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.CDF \

00379                         --cels ../../../regression-data/data/cel/Cytogenetics_Array/HapMap-As_NA18943_C11_01_NN_20081218.CEL \
00380                         --cels ../../../regression-data/data/cel/Cytogenetics_Array/HapMap-As_NA18971_C02_01_NN_20081218.CEL \

00390                         --analysis log2-ratio-cyto2.gc-correction=true.median-autosome-median-normalization=true.median-smooth-marker-count=5.trim-high=2.0.trim-low=-2.5 \
00391                         --analysis kernel-smooth.sigma_span=50 \
00392                         --analysis cn-cyto2.diagonal-weight=0.995.mapd-weight=0.22.min-segment-size=5.hmm-confidence-weight=0.6 \
00393                         --analysis cn-cyto2-gender.cutoff=0.5 \
00394                         --analysis cn-segment \
00395                         --analysis loh-cyto2.lohCNSegSeparation=1000000.minInformation=100.lambdaCritical=8.0 \
00396                         --analysis mosaicism.marker-bandwidth=6000.confidence-window=251 \
00397                         --analysis allele-peaks.step=100.window=250.point-count=128.bandwidth=0.45.cutoff=0.05 \
00398                         --local-gc-background-correction-reference-method pdnn-reference-method \
00399                         --wave-correction-reference-method wave-correction-reference-method.trim=2.0.percentile=0.75.demean=false \
00400                         --local-gc-background-intensity-adjustment-method pdnn-intensity-adjustment-method.predicted-intensity-bin-count=20.gc-bin-count=20.residual-trim=2.0 \
00401                         --image-correction-intensity-adjustment-method high-pass-filter-intensity-adjustment-method.data-block-rows=320.data-block-cols=2015.mini-block-rows=8.mini-block-cols=8.global-smooth-weight=256.local-smooth-weight=64.converged=0.0001 \
00402                         --wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method.bandwidth=101.bin-count=25.wave-count=3 \
00403                 ";
00404 
00405 
00406 
00407             RegressionTest test2("batch_newLOH part 2", command2.c_str(), checks2, false);
00408             test2.setSuite(*this,  outdir, outdir + "/apt-copynumber-cyto.log", outdir + "/valgrind.log");
00409             if(!test2.pass()) {
00410                 Verbose::out(1, "Error in: batch_newLOH part 2. " + test2.getErrorMsg());
00411             }
00412             else
00413             {
00414                 Verbose::out(1, "Passed: batch_newLOH part 2. " + test.getErrorMsg());   
00415             }
00416             {
00417                 m_numPassed += test2.getNumPassed();
00418                 m_numFailed += test2.getNumFailed();
00419             }
00420 
00421         }

00760 void batch()
00761 {

00763         string outdir = Fs::join(m_testDir, "batch");
00764         Fs::rmdirPath(outdir, false);

00768

00770                     -v 3 --cyto2 true \
00771                     --force true \
00772                     --check-input-files true \
00773                     --text-output true \
00774                     --cnchp-output false \
00775                     --cychp-output true \
00776                     --set-analysis-name ca \
00777                     --keep-intermediate-data true \
00778                     --meta-data-info wittgenstein=bushido \
00779                     --meta-data-info batchMode=Creation \
00780                     --reference-output " + m_testDir + "/batch/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.REF_MODEL \
00781                     --snp-reference-input-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.na28.snpref.a5 \
00782                     --snp-reference-output-file " + m_testDir + "/batch/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.snpref.a5 \
00783                     --cdf-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.CDF \
00784                     --chrX-probes ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.chrXprobes \
00785                     --chrY-probes ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.chrYprobes \
00786                     --annotation-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.na28.annot.db \
00787                     --probe-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.probe_tab \
00788                     --snp-qc-snp-list ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.snplist.txt \
00789                     --gender-override-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/HapMap-LOHReference-Full-Genders.txt \
00790                     --genotype-call-override-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/HapMapCalls_LOHReferenceSet-FullArray.txt \
00791                     --cel-files ../../../regression-data/data/cel/Cytogenetics_Array/CELFileList_5F5M.txt \
00792                     --out-dir " + outdir + "        \
00793                     --male-gender-ratio-cutoff=1.3 \
00794                     --female-gender-ratio-cutoff=1.0 \
00795                     --xx-cutoff=0.8 \
00796                     --xx-cutoff-high=1.07 \
00797                     --y-cutoff=0.65 \

01121 
01122 
01123             RegressionTest test2("CytoScanCreate part 2", command2.c_str(), checks2);
01124             test2.setSuite(*this,  outdir2, outdir2 + "/apt-copynumber-cyto.log", outdir2 + "/valgrind.log");
01125             bPassed = test2.pass();

01128             }
01129             else

01132             }
01133

01194 void CytoScanBatch()
01195 {
01196         Verbose::out(1, "Working on CytoScanBatch part 1.");
01197         string outdir = Fs::join(m_testDir, "CytoScanBatch");
01198         Fs::rmdirPath(outdir, false);
01199         Fs::mkdir(outdir, false);
01200         vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
01201 
01202         string command = "./apt-copynumber-cyto \
01203                     -verbose 4 \
01204                     --cyto2 false \
01205                     --force false \
01206                     --keep-intermediate-data false \
01207                     --doDualNormalization true \
01208                     --adapter-type-normalization false \
01209                     --probe-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/CytoScan/CytoScanHD_Array.probe_tab \
01210                     --run-geno-qc true \
01211                     --qca-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/CytoScan/CytoScanHD_Array.r1.qca \
01212                     --qcc-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/CytoScan/CytoScanHD_Array.r1.qcc \
01213                     --text-output false \
01214                     --cnchp-output false \
01215                     --cychp-output true \
01216                     --reference-output " + m_testDir + "/CytoScanBatch/CNReferenceOutput.a5 \
01217                     --cdf-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/CytoScan/CytoScanHD_Array.cdf \
01218                     --chrX-probes ../../../regression-data/data/lib/CytoScan/CytoScanHD_AllCNprobeshg19.chrXprobes \
01219                     --chrY-probes ../../../regression-data/data/lib/CytoScan/CytoScanHD_AllCNprobeshg19.chrYprobes \
01220                     --annotation-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/CytoScan/CytoScanHD_Array.na31.1.annot.db \
01221                     --male-gender-ratio-cutoff 1.5 \
01222                     --female-gender-ratio-cutoff 0.9 \
01223                     --xx-cutoff 0.61 \
01224                     --xx-cutoff-high 0.95 \
01225                     --y-cutoff 0.58 \
01226                     --out-dir " + outdir + " \
01227                     --signal-adjustment-covariates covariate-signal-adjuster.order=fragment-adapter-type,fragment-length.bin-type=discrete,equally-populated.bin-count=0,100 \
01228                     --lr-adjustment-covariates covariate-lr-adjuster.order=fragment-gc,probe-gc,median-signal.bin-type=equally-populated,discrete,equally-populated.bin-count=100,0,100.iqr-scaling=off,on,on.subtract-from-XY=on,off,on \
01229                     --wave-correction-reference-method wave-correction-reference-method.trim=2.0.percentile=0.75.wave-count=6.demean=false \
01230                     --local-gc-background-correction-reference-method none \
01231                     --local-gc-background-intensity-adjustment-method none \
01232                     --image-correction-intensity-adjustment-method none \
01233                     ../../../regression-data/data/cel/CytoScan/NA12874_A05_Baseline_CytoScanHD_VH_20101103.CEL \

01237                     ../../../regression-data/data/cel/CytoScan/NA18854_A06_Baseline_CytoScanHD_VH_20101103.CEL \
01238                     ../../../regression-data/data/cel/CytoScan/NA19131_A04_Baseline_CytoScanHD_VH_20101103.CEL \
01239          ";
01240

01244         std::set<std::string> setLocalIgnore;

01265         }

01269         }
01270 
01271         {
01272             m_numPassed += test.getNumPassed();
01273             m_numFailed += test.getNumFailed();
01274         }
01275 
01276 
01277         Verbose::out(1, "Working on CytoScanBatch part2.");
01278         std::string  goldDirectory="../../../regression-data/data/copynumber/copynumber-cyto/CytoScanBatch";
01279         std::string  newDirectory=Fs::join(m_testDir, "CytoScanBatch/");
01280         std::string  infix="CytoScanHD";
01281 
01282         std::set<std::string> setSetIgnore;
01283 #ifdef _WIN64
01284             {
01285                 std::string ignoreString = "ProbeSets.AllelePeaks";
01286                 setSetIgnore.clear(); 
01287                 setSetIgnore.insert(ignoreString);
01288             }
01289 #endif

01292

01310         #endif

01322                                                 false));

01325

01328                         --verbose 4 --cyto2 false \
01329                         --doDualNormalization true \
01330                         --keep-intermediate-data-local false \
01331                         --run-geno-qc true \
01332                         --qca-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/CytoScan/CytoScanHD_Array.r1.qca \
01333                         --qcc-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/CytoScan/CytoScanHD_Array.r1.qcc \
01334                         --snp-qc-use-contrast true \
01335                         --snp-qc-snp-list ../../../regression-data/data/lib/CytoScan/CytoScanHD_Array.snplist.txt \
01336                         --force false \
01337                         --adapter-type-normalization false \
01338                         --text-output true \
01339                         --cnchp-output false \
01340                         --cychp-output true \
01341                         --set-analysis-name CytoScanHD \
01342                         --cdf-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/CytoScan/CytoScanHD_Array.cdf \
01343                         --chrX-probes ../../../regression-data/data/lib/CytoScan/CytoScanHD_AllCNprobeshg19.chrXprobes \
01344                         --chrY-probes ../../../regression-data/data/lib/CytoScan/CytoScanHD_AllCNprobeshg19.chrYprobes \

01347                         --out-dir " + outdir2 + " \
01348                         --male-gender-ratio-cutoff 1.5 \
01349                         --female-gender-ratio-cutoff 0.9 \
01350                         --xx-cutoff 0.61 \
01351                         --xx-cutoff-high 0.95 \
01352                         --y-cutoff 0.58 \
01353                         --log2ratio-adjustment-method log2ratio-adjustment-method-high-pass-filter \
01354                         --local-gc-background-intensity-adjustment-method none \
01355                         --image-correction-intensity-adjustment-method none \
01356                         --wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method.bandwidth=101.bin-count=25.wave-count=6.wave-smooth=true \
01357                         --analysis genotype \

01359                         --analysis gaussian-smooth.expSmoothSignal=1.smooth_sigma_multiplier=2.smooth_bw=50000 \
01360                         --analysis log2-ratio.gc-correction=false.median-autosome-median-normalization=true.median-smooth-marker-count=5 \
01361                         --analysis cn-cyto2.hmmCN_state=\"\'\"0,1,2,3,4,5\"\'\".hmmCN_mu=\"\'\"-2,-0.54,0,0.37,0.57,0.74\"\'\".hmmCN_sigma=\"\'\"0.26,0.26,0.26,0.26,0.26,0.26\"\'\".diagonal-weight=0.999.mapd-weight=0.min-segment-size=5.hmm-confidence-weight=0.6 \
01362                         --analysis cn-cyto2-gender.cutoff=0.5 \

01364                         --analysis lohCytoScan.lohCS_errorrate=0.05.lohCS_beta=0.001.lohCS_alpha=0.01.lohCS_separation=1000000.lohCS_nMinMarkers=10.lohCS_NoCallThreshold=0.05.lohCS_minGenomicSpan=1000000 \

01366                          ../../../regression-data/data/cel/CytoScan/NA12874_A05_Baseline_CytoScanHD_VH_20101103.CEL \

01553             --chrY-probes ../../../regression-data/data/lib/CytoScan/Version.mar21.11/CytoScanHD_Array.chrYprobes \
01554             --annotation-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/CytoScan/Version.mar21.11/CytoScanHD_Array.na31.annot.db \
01555             --reference-input ../../../regression-data/data/lib/CytoScan/Version.mar21.11/CytoScanHD_Array.na31.v1.REF_MODEL \
01556             --out-dir " + outdir1 + " \
01557             --male-gender-ratio-cutoff 1.5 \
01558             --female-gender-ratio-cutoff 0.9 \
01559             --xx-cutoff 0.61 \
01560             --xx-cutoff-high 0.95 \
01561             --y-cutoff 0.58 \
01562             --local-gc-background-intensity-adjustment-method none \
01563             --image-correction-intensity-adjustment-method none \
01564             --wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method.bandwidth=101.bin-count=25.wave-count=6.wave-smooth=true \
01565             --analysis genotype \
01566             --analysis log2-ratio.gc-correction=false.median-autosome-median-normalization=true.median-smooth-marker-count=5 \
01567             --analysis allelic-difference-CytoScan.outlier-trim=3.0.step=20.window=100.point-count=128.bandwidth=0.25.cutoff=0.05.clean-threshold=0.35.symmetry=true \
01568             --analysis kernel-smooth.sigma_span=50 \
01569             --analysis cn-cyto2.hmmCN_state=\"\'\"0,1,2,3,4\"\'\".hmmCN_mu=\"\'\"-2,-0.45,0,0.3,0.51\"\'\".hmmCN_sigma=\"\'\"0.35,0.35,0.25,0.25,0.25\"\'\".hmmCN_state-X=\"\'\"0,1,2,3,4\"\'\".hmmCN_mu-X=\"\'\"-2,-0.47,0,0.33,0.53\"\'\".hmmCN_sigma-X=\"\'\"0.35,0.35,0.25,0.25,0.25\"\'\".hmmCN_state-Y=\"\'\"0,1,2,3,4\"\'\".hmmCN_mu-Y=\"\'\"-2,-0.45,0,0.3,0.51\"\'\".hmmCN_sigma-Y=\"\'\"0.35,0.35,0.25,0.25,0.25\"\'\".diagonal-weight-Y=0.995.mapd-weight-Y=0.min-segment-size-Y=5.hmm-confidence-weight-Y=0.6.diagonal-weight=0.995.mapd-weight=0.min-segment-size=5.hmm-confidence-weight=0.6.diagonal-weight-X=0.995.mapd-weight-X=0.min-segment-size-X=5.hmm-confidence-weight-X=0.6 \
01570              --analysis cn-cyto2-gender.cutoff=0.5 \
01571              --analysis cn-segment \
01572              --analysis lohCytoScan.lohCS_errorrate=0.05.lohCS_beta=0.001.lohCS_alpha=0.01.lohCS_separation=1000000.lohCS_nMinMarkers=10.lohCS_NoCallThreshold=0.05.lohCS_minGenomicSpan=1000000 \
01573             --analysis loh-segment \
01574             --analysis cn-neutral-loh \
01575             ../../../regression-data/data/cel/CytoScan/Ref103_A1_Alpha_CytoScan_DF_20101512.CEL \
01576             ../../../regression-data/data/cel/CytoScan/NA16595_B6_Alpha_CytoScan_JS_20101512.CEL \
01577             ../../../regression-data/data/cel/CytoScan/3x_A4_Alpha_CytoScan_DF_20101512.CEL \
01578         ";
01579

01581         test1.setSuite(*this,  outdir1, outdir1 + "/apt-copynumber-cyto.log", outdir1 + "/valgrind.CytoScanUsePart1.log");
01582

01584         if(!bPassed) 
01585         {

01587         }

01591         }
01592

01595             m_numFailed += test1.getNumFailed();
01596         }

01610                                                 goldDirectory,

01618                                                 false));

01723          --male-gender-ratio-cutoff 0.71 \
01724          --female-gender-ratio-cutoff 0.48 \
01725          --xx-cutoff 0.8 \
01726          --xx-cutoff-high 1.07 \
01727          --y-cutoff 0.65 \
01728          --local-gc-background-correction-reference-method none \
01729          --local-gc-background-intensity-adjustment-method none \
01730          --image-correction-intensity-adjustment-method none \
01731          --wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method.bandwidth=101.bin-count=25.wave-count=7 \

01733          ../../../regression-data/data/cel/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA12004_GW6_C.CEL \
01734          ../../../regression-data/data/cel/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA12003_GW6_C.CEL \

01740

01744

01747         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "CN5", "CN5.snp-posteriors", setLocalIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
01748         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "CN5", "target-sketch", setLocalIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));

01751

01754

01756         bPassed = test.pass();
01757         if(!bPassed) {
01758             Verbose::out(1, "Error in:  batch_snp6_noAdapter part 1" + test.getErrorMsg());
01759         }
01760         else
01761         {
01762             Verbose::out(1, "Passed: batch_snp6_noAdapter part 1 " + test.getErrorMsg());            
01763         }
01764 
01765         {
01766             m_numPassed += test.getNumPassed();
01767             m_numFailed += test.getNumFailed();
01768 
01769         }

01771         {
01772             Verbose::out(1, "Working on batch_snp6_noAdapter part 2.");

01780

01782

01784 
01785             checks2.push_back(new CychpCheck(
01786                                                 m_vCytogenetics_SNP6_SixFiles,
01787                                                 goldDirectory,
01788                                                 newDirectory,
01789                                                 infix,
01790                                                 setIgnore,
01791                                                 setSetIgnore,
01792                                                 mapEpsilon,
01793                                                 0.0001,
01794                                                 0.9999989,
01795                                                 false));
01796 
01797 
01798             string command2 = "./apt-copynumber-cyto \
01799             -verbose 1 \
01800             --cyto2 false \
01801             --force true \
01802             --adapter-type-normalization false \
01803             --doDualNormalization false \
01804             --keep-intermediate-data false \
01805             --analysis genotype \
01806             --analysis log2-ratio.gc-correction=false \
01807             --analysis gaussian-smooth \
01808             --analysis allelic-difference \
01809             --analysis cn-state \

01822             --cdf-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.cdf \

01936         test.setSuite(*this,  outdir, outdir + "/apt-copynumber-cyto.log", outdir + "/valgrind.log");
01937         bool bPassed = false;
01938         bPassed = test.pass();
01939         {
01940             m_numPassed += test.getNumPassed();
01941             m_numFailed += test.getNumFailed();
01942         }
01943

01945             Verbose::out(1, "Error in:  batch_snp6_dual_noAdapter part 1" + test.getErrorMsg());
01946         }
01947         else
01948         {
01949             Verbose::out(1, "Passed: batch_snp6_dual_noAdapter part 1 " + test.getErrorMsg());            
01950         }
01951 
01952         if (bPassed)
01953         {
01954             Verbose::out(1, "Working on batch_snp6_dual_noAdapter part 2.");
01955             string outdir2 = Fs::join(m_testDir, "batch_snp6_dual_noAdapter");
01956 
01957             std::set<std::string> setSetIgnore;
01958 
01959             std::string  goldDirectory="../../../regression-data/data/copynumber/copynumber-cyto/batch_snp6_dual_noAdapter";
01960             std::string  newDirectory= Fs::join(m_testDir, "batch_snp6_dual_noAdapter");
01961             string infix = "CN5";
01962 
01963             std::map<std::string, float> mapEpsilon;
01964 
01965             vector<RegressionCheck *> checks2;
01966 
01967             checks2.push_back(new CychpCheck(
01968                                                 m_vCytogenetics_SNP6_SixFiles,
01969                                                 goldDirectory,
01970                                                 newDirectory,
01971                                                 infix,
01972                                                 setIgnore,
01973                                                 setSetIgnore,
01974                                                 mapEpsilon,
01975                                                 0.0001,
01976                                                 0.9999989,
01977                                                 false));
01978 
01979             string command2 = "./apt-copynumber-cyto \
01980             -verbose 1 \
01981             --cyto2 false \
01982             --force true \
01983             --doDualNormalization true \
01984             --adapter-type-normalization false \
01985             --analysis genotype \
01986             --analysis log2-ratio.gc-correction=false \
01987             --analysis gaussian-smooth \
01988             --analysis allelic-difference \
01989             --analysis cn-state \

01992             --analysis loh-segment  \

01997             --cnchp-output false \
01998             --text-output true \
01999             --reference-input " + m_testDir + "/batch_snp6_dual_noAdapter/CNReference.cyto.snp6.a5.ref \
02000             --set-analysis-name CN5 \
02001             --out-dir " + outdir2 + " \
02002             --cdf-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.cdf \
02003             --chrX-probes ../../../regression-data/data/lib/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.chrXprobes \

02007             --qcc-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.qcc \
02008             --male-gender-ratio-cutoff 0.71 \
02009             --female-gender-ratio-cutoff 0.48 \
02010             --xx-cutoff 0.8 \
02011             --xx-cutoff-high 1.07 \
02012             --y-cutoff 0.55 \
02013             --local-gc-background-correction-reference-method none \
02014             --local-gc-background-intensity-adjustment-method none \
02015             --image-correction-intensity-adjustment-method none \
02016             --wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method.bandwidth=101.bin-count=25.wave-count=7 \
02017             --wave-correction-reference-method wave-correction-reference-method.wave-count=7.trim=2.0.percentile=0.75.demean=false \
02018             ../../../regression-data/data/cel/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA12004_GW6_C.CEL \
02019             ../../../regression-data/data/cel/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA12003_GW6_C.CEL \
02020             ../../../regression-data/data/cel/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA11993_GW6_C.CEL \

02024              ";

02030              }

02488 
02489 int main(int argc, char* argv[]) {
02490     try {
02491 
02492         FsTestDir testDir;
02493         // Full regression takes 26GB.
02494         int64_t byteSize = (30.0 * 1073741824);
02495         testDir.setTestDir("copynumber/copynumber-cyto", true, byteSize ); 
02496         ofstream logOut;
02497         string logName;
02498         logName = Fs::join(testDir.asString(), "test-regression-copynumber-cyto.log");
02499         Verbose::out(1, "Log file: " + logName);
02500         Fs::mustOpenToWrite(logOut, logName.c_str());
02501         LogStream log(3, &logOut);
02502 
02503         Verbose::pushMsgHandler(&log);
02504         Verbose::pushProgressHandler(&log);
02505         Verbose::pushWarnHandler(&log);
02506 
02507         Verbose::setLevel(3);
02508         test_regression_copynumber_cyto test;
02509         test.m_testDir = testDir.asString();
02510         test.parseArgv(argv);
02511         test.doValgrind();
02512         string database = test.getDatabase();
02513 
02514         Verbose::out(1, "Execute regression test: test-regression-copynumber-cyto");
02515 
02516         test.run();
02517 
02518         Verbose::out(1, "NumPassed: " + ToStr(test.getNumPassed()) + " NumFailed: " + ToStr(test.getNumFailed()) + " for test-regression-copynumber-cyto");
02519         logOut.close();
02520         return test.getNumFailed() != 0;
02521     }
02522     catch(...) {
02523         Verbose::out(1,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
02524         return 1;
02525     }
02526     return 1;
02527 }
